description.en: AniMixPlay is a website that allows you to watch Anime from all around the world, completely free.
description.ga_IE: Is suíomh Gréasáin é AniMixPlay a ligeann duit féachaint ar Anime ó gach cearn den domhan, go hiomlán saor in aisce.
description.nl: AniMixPlay is een website waarmee je gratis anime van over de hele wereld kunt bekijken.
description.vi_VN: AniMixPlay là trang web giúp bạn xem Anime khắp thể giới, hoàn toàn miễn phí.
